name: OR_CASE_INSTR_NEED
description: The OR_CASE_INSTR_NEED table contains OR management system case surgical instruments.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the surgical instrument requested for the case.

columns.name: INSTRUMENT_PANEL
columns.description: The panel where the surgical instrument is requested.

columns.name: INSTRUMENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of surgical instrument requested for the case.

columns.name: INSTRUMENT_CMT
columns.description: A free-text comment about an instrument.
